text.en: Supreme protector of sentient beings, Orgyen Rinpoche,
Together with the assembly of vidyādharas and ḍākinīs—
text.en-trans: rigdzin khandrö tsok dang chepa la

text.en: To you we pray with one-pointed devotion!
text.en-trans: dak sok tsé chik güpé solwa deb

text.en: As you promised, consider us lovingly from the absolute expanse!
text.en-trans: zhalzhé zhindu ying né tser gong la

text.en: Look upon us, exhausted beings, with compassion!
text.en-trans: nyam tak dro la tukjé zik su sol

text.en: We pray to you, Orgyen Rinpoche:
Dispel adversity and pacify all discord
text.en-trans: kyen ngen dok chik ma dang khandrö tsok

text.en: From mātṛkās and ḍākinīs and degenerations of the age;
text.en-trans: mitün dü kyi güpa kün zhi zhing

text.en: Increase prosperity in the environment and among its inhabitants;
Conflict, epidemics, earthquakes, plagues of vermin and so forth,
text.en-trans: dü truk né rim sayö busin sok

text.en: Evil thoughts and actions among those with and without form—
Please pacify all such forms of adversity!
text.en-trans: mitün chok kün zhiwar dzé du sol

text.en: May the teachings spread and the holders have long lives,
text.en-trans: tenpa dar zhing tendzin kutsé ten

text.en: And may the splendour of joy and happiness fill the world!
text.en-trans: jikten dekyi pal gyi gangwar shok
